title: Source of imac 27'' and 21.5''
message:
I would like to know if you have how to fix these sources ? If you have an electronic diagram of these sources ?

I do not have the 12V and 5v voltages.

title: Source of imac 27'' and 21.5''
message:
No schematics available.
You can work using datasheets, or application notes for the ICs used there.
Some are easy to repair, just caps with high ESR.
Another can give lot of problems.

BE AWARE, dangerous voltage present on these boards!!!
